Detailed Description

A simple holder for event data.

This class is used to parallel the Java code and so we can add functionality in the future if required.

BasicVRTPacket vrt::VRTEvent::getPacket (  )  const [inline]

Gets the packet associated with this error, if avaliable.

Note that the packet may be invalid.

Returns:
The packet or null if not available
VRTObject* vrt::VRTEvent::getSource (  )  const [inline]

Gets the source object associated with this error, if avaliable.

Note that only events created using the constructor that takes in a pointer to the source will have their source made available via this method.

Returns:
The pointer to the source or null if not available.
